creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: sumizuri-e, probably kyo_ka-bon although no kyo_ka on vol.2
inscription:
8 poems on the first page
31 poems on the last pages
markings: mizunoto ushi no toshi (the year of mizunoto and ox) written at rh end of the kyo_ka poems on the first page
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper, with hand-applied color
title: Tosa School Style Sketches of Old Time People vol.1
